entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence Will the WH be accountable for their failure with COVID-19 and bringing calm to the protests. Don;t say you qquelled the protests, you only angered people more with threats of military and desecration of Holy ground and the Bible you held but don't understand its teaching.
